message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your offer wasn't unfair Alice, but I think we can do slightly better. How about this?
Considering the inflation, I think 58-42 is a generous offer. Don't wait, or the money will be worth even less!
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer. It's a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
